text:
Gordon Edward Pinsent, CC, FRSC (July 12, 1930 – December 4, 2020) was a Canadian actor, screenwriter, director and playwright. He is known for his roles in numerous productions, including "Away from Her", "The Rowdyman", "John and the Missus", "A Gift to Last", "Due South", "The Red Green Show" and "Quentin Durgens, M.P." He has been the voice of Babar the elephant in television and film from 1989 to late 2015.
Pinsent died on 4 December 2020 while in hospice care in Los Angeles of complications from stage IV pancreatic cancer. He died at the Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in Los Angeles from the disease on December 4, 2020 at the age of 90.
